fullText: And just like that, a decade went by. Politics have changed, the world has transformed, and the theater industry is certainly different than it was back in the simpler time of 2013. But one thing’s certain in this smoggy summer of 2023: David Byrne and Fatboy Slim’s Here Lies Love — you know, the immersive Imelda Marcos disco musical — is on Broadway for the first time and it is the party to end all parties.

keyPhrases.quote: it is the party to end all parties
Here Lies Love — you know, the immersive Imelda Marcos disco musical — is on Broadway for the first time
the party to end all parties

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic expresses unqualified enthusiasm calling it 'the party to end all parties' with celebratory tone about its Broadway arrival, indicating strong recommendation despite limited specific analysis. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm for the show, describing it as a major event and a must-see experience.
